title: CC Certificate
description: Schema for a Common Criteria (CC) certificate.

cc_id.title: Certificate ID
cc_id.description: The unique identifier of the Common Criteria certificate.

convert_ok.description: Whether the document was successfully converted from PDF to text.

download_ok.description: Whether the document was successfully downloaded.

extract_ok.description: Whether keyword extraction from the document was successful.

pdf_hash.description: SHA256 hash of the PDF document, if available.

txt_hash.description: SHA256 hash of the text document, if available.

json_hash.description: SHA256 hash of the document json representation, if available.

cc_document_state.title: Certificate Document State (cert, report, st)
cc_document_state.description: State of the document processing pipeline for cert, report, or st document.

match_rules.description: List of matching rules that were triggered to identify the front page.

cert_id.title: Certificate ID
cert_id.description: The unique identifier of the Common Criteria certificate.

cert_item.title: Certified Item
cert_item.description: The certified item as extracted from the front page.

developer.title: Developer
developer.description: The developer of the certified item as extracted from the front page.

cert_lab.title: Certification Lab
cert_lab.description: The lab/scheme that issued the certificate as extracted from the front page.

cc_version.title: CC Version
cc_version.description: The version of the Common Criteria standard as extracted from the front page.

cc_security_level.title: CC Security Level
cc_security_level.description: The security level (e.g., EAL) as extracted from the front page.

directly_referenced_by.description: Certificates that directly reference this certificate.

directly_referencing.description: Certificates that are directly referenced by this certificate.

indirectly_referenced_by.description: Certificates that indirectly reference this certificate.

indirectly_referencing.description: Certificates that are indirectly referenced by this certificate.

cc_references.title: Certificate References (report, st)
cc_references.description: References to and from other certificates, based on a document.

family.title: SAR Family
family.description: The family of the Security Assurance Requirement (SAR).

level.title: SAR Level
level.description: The level of the Security Assurance Requirement (SAR).

cc_sar.title: SAR
cc_sar.description: Security Assurance Requirement (SAR) as defined in Common Criteria.

name.title: Certificate Name
name.description: The name of the Common Criteria certificate.

enum: ICs, Smart Cards and Smart Card-Related Devices and Systems
Network and Network-Related Devices and Systems
category.title: Certificate Category
category.description: The category of the Common Criteria certificate.

scheme.title: Certification Scheme
scheme.description: The certification scheme under which the certificate was issued.

status.title: Certificate Status
status.description: The current status of the Common Criteria certificate.

not_valid_after.title: Expiry Date
not_valid_after.description: The date until which the certificate is valid (expiry date).

not_valid_before.title: Certification Date
not_valid_before.description: The date from which the certificate is valid (certification date).

cert_link.title: Certificate Link
cert_link.description: A URL linking to the official certificate document.

report_link.title: Certification Report Link
report_link.description: A URL linking to the certification report document.

st_link.title: Security Target Link
st_link.description: A URL linking to the security target document.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of the certified product.

manufacturer_web.title: Manufacturer Website
manufacturer_web.description: The website URL of the manufacturer.

security_level.title: Security Level
security_level.description: The security levels associated with the certificate.

cert_id.title: Certificate ID
cert_id.description: The unique identifier of the Common Criteria certificate.

cert_lab.title: Certification Lab
cert_lab.description: The lab/scheme that issued the certificate.

extracted_sars.title: Extracted SARs
extracted_sars.description: Security Assurance Requirements (SARs) extracted from the certification documents.

prev_certificates.title: Previous Certificates
prev_certificates.description: List of previous versions of the certificate in a series, if applicable.

next_certificates.title: Next Certificates
next_certificates.description: List of next versions of the certificate in a series, if applicable.

report_references.title: Report References
report_references.description: References to and from other certificates, based on the certification report document.

scheme_data.title: Scheme Data
scheme_data.description: Scheme-specific data extracted from the scheme websites.
scheme_data.$comment: This is a free-form object and can contain any properties.

st_references.title: ST References
st_references.description: References to and from other certificates, based on the security target document.

heuristics.title: Certificate Heuristics
heuristics.description: Heuristic data extracted from the certification documents.

report_metadata.title: Report Metadata
report_metadata.description: Metadata extracted from the certification report PDF document file.

st_metadata.title: ST Metadata
st_metadata.description: Metadata extracted from the security target PDF document file.

report_keywords.title: Report Keywords
report_keywords.description: Keywords extracted from the certification report document.

st_keywords.title: ST Keywords
st_keywords.description: Keywords extracted from the security target document.

pdf_data.title: Extracted PDF Data
pdf_data.description: Data extracted from the certification PDF documents.

state.title: Certificate Document States
state.description: State of the document processing pipeline for cert, report, and st documents.
